# Vstars Transfer - Istanbul Luxury VIP Transfer Services

## Company Overview
Vstars Transfer is a premium chauffeur and transfer service provider based in Istanbul, Turkey. We specialize in high-end airport transfers, hourly chauffeur services, and private city tours using luxury Mercedes-Benz vehicles.

## Core Services
- **Airport Transfers:** VIP pickup and drop-off at Istanbul Airport (IST) and Sabiha Gökçen Airport (SAW). Includes meet & greet service.
- **Hourly Chauffeur Hire:** Daily or hourly rental of luxury vehicles with professional drivers for business meetings, events, or shopping.
- **City Tours:** Private guided tours of Istanbul's historical sites (Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Bosphorus).
- **Medical Tourism Transfer:** Specialized transport for medical guests requiring privacy and comfort.

## Fleet Information
- **Mercedes-Benz Vito VIP:** 6-passenger capacity, leather interior, privacy glass, Wi-Fi, Maybach-style seating.
- **Mercedes-Benz Sprinter VIP:** Large group capacity with luxury amenities.

## Service Area
- Primary: Istanbul (European and Asian sides).
- Secondary: Transfers to nearby cities (Bursa, Sapanca, Yalova).

## Contact & Booking
- Website: https://www.vstarstransfer.com
- Phone: +90 532 643 22 34
- Email: info@vstarstransfer.com
- Operating Hours: 24/7

## Languages Supported
- English (/en)
- Turkish (/tr)
- German (/de)
- Russian (/ru)
